mainTitle: ValeyevStudio ‚Äî a new leap into the future!
description:
New innovative programs from ValeyevPrograms represent a harmonious combination of advanced technologies,
maximum optimization and ease of use. Each application is designed to meet the highest standards,
providing users with a user-friendly and intuitive interface. We strive to ensure that the functionality of our programs
has been maximally adapted to the needs of users, while providing high performance and saving resources.

ValeyevPrograms is the future of software today.
aboutcompany-text:
ValeyevStudio is more than just a software development company ‚Äî it's a vision of a smarter, more efficient digital future.

We specialize in creating high-performance, user-friendly applications under the ValeyevPrograms brand. Every product we release is focused on simplicity, speed, and innovation ‚Äî putting user experience above all else.

Our team is driven by curiosity, creativity, and a constant desire to improve. We don‚Äôt just build software ‚Äî we shape the future of digital tools.
legal-subheading: This agreement regulates the use of the software developed by ValeyevStudio (hereinafter referred to as Nikita Valeyev). By installing and using PixelFPS, PixelKey, and other ValeyevStudio products, you agree to the terms of this agreement.
push-suggestions-text: Write to us, we will definitely consider your feedback and suggestions to improve or add new features.
push-donation-text: For those who want to support the author for the work done. The funds will go to the development of the project ecosystem.

captcha-content.captcha-title: Confirm that you are not a robot

faq.faq-subtitle: All the answers to your questions
faq.faq-main-answer-1: We are a team of developers committed to making our product available to as many people around the world as possible. Everyone should be able to try it ‚Äî completely free of charge!
faq.faq-main-question-2: How do I start using the program?
faq.faq-main-answer-2:
To download our official software, go to the relevant section of the website and click the Download button.

Please note that by downloading our software, you agree to the user agreement and our company policy ‚Äî ValeyevStudio.
faq.faq-main-question-3: What is the cost of the paid subscription?
faq.faq-main-answer-3:
The paid subscription costs 1 US dollar. Once activated, the subscription is valid for 1 calendar month.

The subscription allows you to remove intrusive banners in the settings and access experimental features.
faq.faq-sub-answer-1: Currently, there is only one subscription plan available at a cost of 1 dollar per month.
faq.faq-account-question-1: How can I update my account information?
faq.faq-account-answer-1: You can update your information in the "Account Settings" section of your personal dashboard.
faq.faq-security-answer-1:
Your data is absolutely secure.

We take user protection seriously:
- Passwords are encrypted using the **bcrypt** algorithm.
- All data is transmitted via **secure HTTPS connection**.
- We use only trusted security tools and methods.
- Our **multi-layered security architecture** protects against all threats.

Your data is safe ‚Äî we‚Äôve done everything to let you focus on what matters.
faq.faq-security-answer-2:
Password changes are processed via a **unique encrypted token** that is valid for a **strictly limited time** and automatically expires after the operation.

This ensures only authorized users can change the password and prevents interception or reuse. We use **modern cryptographic methods** to guarantee security.
faq.faq-security-question-3: How can I enable extra account protection?
faq.faq-security-answer-3:
In the user menu, go to **Settings**, then navigate to the **Security** section, where you can enable **Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)** using **Google Authenticator**.

Even if someone gets your password, without the 2FA code from the app, they won‚Äôt be able to access your account.

**2FA is one of the most effective ways to protect your data from breaches.**
faq.faq-other-answer-1: We are a distributed team working from all over the world. We don‚Äôt have a single physical office.

legal-content.intro: This agreement regulates the use of software developed by ValeyevStudio.
legal-content.section1-1: 1.1. The user receives a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable right to use the software.
legal-content.section1-2: 1.2. The software is provided "as is" without any warranties.
section2-1-list: Selling, distributing, or modifying the software without permission from ValeyevStudio.
Publishing the software under another name.
legal-content.section2-2: 2.2. When posted on third-party sites ‚Äî only the original version with author attribution.
legal-content.section3-1: 3.1. The developer may change functionality and release updates.
legal-content.section3-2: 3.2. The developer is not responsible for failures.
legal-content.section4-1: 4.1. Use the software at your own risk.
legal-content.section5-1: 5.1. The agreement may be changed, the current version is on the official website.
privacy-data-list: Account data: login, password, subscription status.
Personal data: full name, date of birth, region, city.
privacy-usage-list: For authorization, personalization, and access to premium features.
legal-content.privacy-3-1: 3.1. We use modern protection methods, including encryption.
legal-content.privacy-3-2: 3.2. Access is only available to ValeyevStudio employees.
legal-content.privacy-4-1: 4.1. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.
legal-content.privacy-5-1: Send a request for deletion to: valeyevstudio@gmail.com.—è
legal-content.privacy-6-1: 6.1. We may change the policy and notify users about it.

bio.title: Biography
bio.hint: The biography should be no more than 500 characters long!

forgotpassword.modal-forgotpassword-description: Please enter your email address associated with your account. We will email instructions on how to reset your password.
forgotpassword.input-forgotpassword-success: If a user account exists with the entered email, we will send an email with further instructions to reset the password.

registration.password-hint: The password must contain at least 6 characters and special characters (! ‚Äú # $ % ‚Äò () *)
registration.agreement-note: By clicking the registration button, you agree to the {link}.

referals.referral.title: Referral control panel
referals.program_description: You will receive 1.5 per invited user. The rate increases for premium users. double to 3.0 per invited user. Funds are credited to the balance immediately.
referals.activate_description: Activate the referral code of the user who invited you and get 3 to the balance. The user who invited you will receive 1 without a premium subscription and 3 with a premium subscription.

modal-deposit.description-promocode: Enter a promo code and receive money that can be spent on buying a subscription, a code, and gifts for a friend. The promo code consists of 16 characters.

roadmap.stage-discription1: We will continue to improve the stability, loading speed, and user experience of both the website and the main software.
roadmap.stage-2: Migration to Modern Servers and Database Upgrade
roadmap.stage-discription2: We plan to migrate to a more powerful server infrastructure with a new data management and storage interface.
roadmap.stage-3: Announcement and Launch of PixelKey Product
roadmap.stage-discription3: Announcement and release of an innovative tool for music producers and beatmakers ‚Äî the PixelKey platform focused on creativity and ease of use.
roadmap.stage-discription4: Active work on PR: press releases, interviews, articles, and collaborations with relevant media and bloggers.
roadmap.stage-discription5: Launching ad campaigns, integrating payment systems, and developing monetization models.
roadmap.stage-discription6: Building a sustainable ecosystem supported by partners, investors, and strategic allies.

brand.brand.head.title: ValeyevStudio brand material
brand.brand.materials.description: Download our official materials and read the rules for their use. Read the rules
brand.brand.logoinfo.title: Logo
brand.brand.logoinfo.description:
The ValeyevStudio logo is the unique and main symbol of our studio. It comes in two versions: the full version includes both the icon and the text, while the compact version features only the icon.

The icon consists of a square shape with rounded corners and the text "VS" representing ValeyevStudio. The text uses the custom Mi Sans font.
brand.brand.productinfo.title: Our Products
brand.brand.productinfo.description:
The main products of our studio have a branded design and their own logo. Each logo contains an icon and a text part.

The icon consists of a unique product mark on a square shape with rounded corners. The text uses the custom Mi Sans font.
